WorkItem.Description: I hit optimize with talents, and I came up with a DPS increase from 2.8k to 9k. This is what I got.

Comments.Message:
Sorry, forgot Name and Server.

Server: US Dawnbringer
Name: Eriklese

I need to open your character file and will do that in a few but prelim statements:

Don't use Optimize with "Talents" as that will pretty much guarantee a failed result. Talent Specs is OK so long as you set up reasonable specs and not something really weird.

Bladestorm's value can jump up dramatically with an increased Multiple Targets setting.

Your XML file shows that you loaded the character and gave some basic settings and set a couple other more advanced ones. However you don't have any buffs active besides Elixir of Mighty Strength (which isn't a very good one). You need to add the rest of the buffs you normally run with. I'm also seeing that you only have the base abilities activated, try enabling Heroic Strikes, Cleaves, the Shout you normally do, Bloodrage, etc.

Once you have done that, repost your file and note any differences you see for me.
Regardless of the tips that Jothay is giving us, this is certainly a bug in our code; thanks for finding it :)  We're investigating it right now

Turned on some buffs and a few of the other options. Bladestorm is now at 16.5K DPS, and Overall DPS is at 21k

I did notice that turning on certain options would bring me back down to a reasonable 3k DPS. Those options being any one of the following: <20% Execute, Sunder Armor, and Scroll of Agility.

I left those off in my file so everyone can see my mad awesome 21k DPS =D
